mapper.select: select m.nknm, m.path, b.bids, b.stat, DATE_FORMAT(b.time, '%H:%i:%s') as time from bdhs b left outer join memb m on b.mno=m.mno where itno=#{value} order by bids desc;

select b.hsno, b.itno, b.bids, b.stat, i.itno, i.titl, i.time, m.nknm, m.mno from bdhs b left outer join item i on i.itno=b.itno left outer join memb m on m.mno=b.mno where now() - interval 6 minute < i.time and i.time < now() - interval 3 minute order by b.bids desc limit 5;

select i.itno, i.mno, i.titl, i.time, i.stpc, p.path, m.nknm, b.bids, b.time from item i left outer join bdhs b on i.itno=b.itno left outer join memb m on b.mno=m.mno left outer join phot p on i.itno=p.itno where i.mno=#{memberNo}
select stat from bdhs where itno=#{itemNo} and bids=#{bids};
